summary: Casts-Destruction, a female Argonian Mage specializing in Destruction, can be found in the Bannered Mare in Whiterun.
descriptionHtml:
This is my first EVER Mod.

Casts-Destruction is a female Argonian Mage specializing in Destruction. She can be found in the Bannered Mare in Whiterun.
If everything is going correctly, you should have the option for her to follow you when you talk to her.

She knows a few Destruction spells, including Healing for herself.

She is essential and should not die.

she has been created entirely from the Skyrim NPC Editor.

She has the voice of the Female Commander, like Aela The Huntress for example. This is because I had to be sure of the follower voice actor, seeing as though I don't think there's follower lines for the Female Argonian voice actor.

Please leave in the comments if you want me to produce a backstory for her, or to give her a staff.
author: Q-0003
